question: Who is eligible to take part in CREATION 2023?
answers: Only NUS undergraduate students shall be eligible to participate in CREATION 2023.

question: Are there any charges to participate in CREATION 2023?
answers: Participation in CREATION 2023 is FREE of charge.

question: Can each participation participate in more than one challenge statement?
answers: Of course! However, only the last submission for each challenge statement will be taken and shortlisted by the CREATION committee.

question: I do not have Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator installed on my laptop. What should I do?
answers: Participants can use the Adobe software installed on the computers at NUSSU commIT computer centers at these locations to work on their designs:
AS8 Level 2, open Monday to Friday, 9am to 7pm

question: Will the judging criteria vary among the problem statement?
answers: Yes, assessment criteria will vary among challenge statements. Participants could check the assessment criteria on Rules and Regulations > Selection Process.

question: Is it compulsory for the participants to attend the closing ceremony?
answers: Althought it is no longer compulsory, you are still encouraged to attend the closing ceremony as the judges will announce the winner during that day.
Do not worry, if you are the winners and unable to come, we will inform you via email to claim your prize at another timing.
Furthermore, we will provide refreshments, meal, and goodie bags to all of the participants.

question: Is it compulsory for the participants to attend the Advanced Photoshop Workshop on 5 February 2023?
answers: No, but the participants are highly encouraged to attend since this free workshop is conducted by a certified trainer from Acadia Training. Participants get to learn advanced Photoshop skills from this workshop and apply them on their designs.

question: Must I join the competition to be able to attend the Advanced Photoshop Workshop on 5 February 2023?
answers: No, however priority will be given to students who have signed up for a challenge in CREATION 2023. A deposit of $5 needs to be paid by the student which will be returned to the student after he/she made a submission of the designs.

question: Can I join the competition as a team?
answers: No, CREATION 2023 is an individual competition.

question: Can I use a software other than Adobe Photoshop or Adobe Illustrator?
answers: No, participants are strictly required to use Adobe Photoshop and/or Adobe Illustrator or stated otherwise. Please check with the requirement of each challenge statement. Participants can use the computers at the NUSSU commIT computer centers at YIH Level 3 or AS8 Level 2 to work on their designs, if they do not have the software installed on their computers.

question: Is it compulsory for the participants to upload their CVs?
answers: No, it is voluntary for the participants to share their CVs with the startups supported by NUS Enterprise for potential internship opportunities. With the submission should the participants consent to allow their CVs to be shared though. Please also note that the internship is not guaranteed, and the decision lies with the startup. This initiative is a value-add to participants that the competition does not stop when it is over, but it can extend beyond.
